theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Senescence and Cell Cycle Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on senescence regulation in stem cells mediated by Smurf2 affecting self-renewal and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Proliferation and Cycling-Driven Exhaustion Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes stem cell cycling activity driving reproductive senescence via DNA damage accumulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Integrated Intrinsic and Extrinsic Stem Cell Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes stem cell aging driven by both intrinsic damage and extrinsic niche/systemic changes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Niche-Driven Stem Cell Functional Decline Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Attributes aging-related decline primarily to aging of stem cell niches impairing progenitor function.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Functional Depletion and Exhaustion Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on functional depletion of stem cells reducing regenerative capacity and driving aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Integrated Intrinsic and Extrinsic Stem Cell Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights intrinsic and extrinsic factors causing functional decline and senescence in stem cells.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Neuromuscular Stem Cell and Motor Unit Remodeling Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on motor unit remodeling and neuromuscular junction instability contributing to muscle aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Functional Decline and Stemness Loss Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes pan-tissue decline in stem cell function and stemness rather than number depletion.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Division Pattern and Spindle Orientation Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on mitotic spindle orientation changes regulating stem cell fate and aging in intestine.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Integrated Intrinsic and Extrinsic Stem Cell Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes stem cell aging driven by intrinsic DNA damage and extrinsic niche/systemic factors.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Integrated Intrinsic and Extrinsic Stem Cell Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Uses progeroid syndromes to model intrinsic and extrinsic stem cell aging mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Proliferation and Cycling-Driven Exhaustion Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links hematopoietic stem cell cycling rates genetically to lifespan and aging via replicative limits.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Integrated Intrinsic and Extrinsic Stem Cell Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on muscle stem cell aging driven by intrinsic metabolic and extrinsic niche changes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Functional Depletion and Exhaustion Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes stem cell pool depletion and functional decline impairing tissue regeneration.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere-Associated Stem Cell Exhaustion and Regenerative Decline Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes telomere shortening and stem cell exhaustion reducing regenerative capacity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Integrated Intrinsic and Extrinsic Stem Cell Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes intrinsic stem cell aging modulated by niche and systemic environment influences.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Senescence and Cell Cycle Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on p16INK4a-mediated senescence and irreversible geroconversion in muscle stem cells.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Metabolic Regulation of Stem Cell Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights metabolic dysregulation and mitochondrial dysfunction driving stem cell aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Nuclear Architecture and Stem Cell Dysfunction in Accelerated Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on progerin-induced nuclear defects causing adult stem cell dysfunction and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Neuromuscular Stem Cell and Motor Unit Remodeling Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes motor neuron loss and neuromuscular decline driving sarcopenia and muscle aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Intrinsic Aging and Regenerative Decline Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on intrinsic stem/precursor cell aging reducing regenerative potential and remyelination.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Proliferation and Cycling-Driven Exhaustion Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes Cdc25/String regulation of stem cell proliferation decline driving tissue aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Senescence and Cell Cycle Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on DNA damage, oxidative stress, and senescence limiting stem cell function with age.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Niche-Driven Stem Cell Functional Decline Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Attributes stem cell aging to decline in niche signaling and niche senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Selection and Damage Accumulation in Stem Cell Pool Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes accumulation of damage and selection of apoptosis-resistant stem cells with age.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Proliferation and Cycling-Driven Exhaustion Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on genetically determined mitotic clock limiting hematopoietic stem cell self-renewal.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Nuclear Architecture and Stem Cell Dysfunction in Accelerated Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes lamin A mutation causing nuclear fragility and stem cell exhaustion in progeria.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Metabolic Regulation of Stem Cell Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Integrates metabolism, epigenetics, and cell cycle regulation in stem cell exhaustion and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Division Pattern and Spindle Orientation Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on altered intrinsic/extrinsic regulation of stem cell division patterns with age.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Senescence and Cell Cycle Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes FGF signaling regulating stem cell self-renewal and senescence in aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Proliferation and Cycling-Driven Exhaustion Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes tradeoffs between stem cell turnover rates, mutation accumulation, aging, and cancer.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Negligible Senescence via Continuous Stem Cell Renewal Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Hydra maintains continuous stem cell renewal and stress resistance, avoiding aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Proliferation and Cycling-Driven Exhaustion Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on intestinal stem cell proliferation differences driving sex-specific gut aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Functional Depletion and Exhaustion Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes satellite cell decline causing muscle nuclear loss and atrophy during aging.
